TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LegendCell extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement implements class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IChartMapArea

Docs.summary: Represents a legend cell in a legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A legend is populated with legend items, which are represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection>. These legend items consist of individual legend cells, which are in turn represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection>.

Docs.param: A value that represent the cell text or image name, depending on the type of cell.

A string value that represents the cell text or image name, depending on the type of cell.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified cell type and a parameter that specifies the cell text or image name.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Drawing.ContentAlignment Alignment { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the alignment of the legend cell contents.
Docs.value: A value that represents the alignment of the legend cell contents. The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Alignment property is used to align text, series symbols or images within the legend cell.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Drawing.Color BackColor { get; set; }

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the legend cell.
Docs.value: A value used to draw the legend cell's background.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The BackColor property has the highest priority when setting the background color of any entity in the legend.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CellSpan { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the number of horizontal cells used to draw the contents of the legend cell.
Docs.value: An value that represents the number of horizontal cells used to draw the legend cell contents. The default value is 1.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the cell contents must extend beyond the cell width, you can set the CellSpan property to the number of cells required to fit the contents. This property is most often used if you wish to add an extended header or title to the legend.
When this property is set to a value larger than 1, empty legend cells must be added in order to accommodate the contents of the extended legend cell.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the legend cell type.
Docs.value: A enumeration value that represents the type that will be used to define the contents of the legend cell. The default value is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The CellType property determines the type of content that will be displayed in each individual legend cell. One of the following cell types must be specified:
- Text: A string is specified using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.Text%2A> property, and will be displayed in the legend cell.
- SeriesSymbol: A series symbol is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> class. It will be displayed for the legend cell. Recall that a series symbol is a visual indicator—a line, rectangle or marker. When <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>, all marker attributes of the custom item apply to the cell.
- Image: An image is defined using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.Image%2A> property and will be displayed in the legend cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Drawing.Font Font { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the font for the legend cell.
Docs.value: A object that represents the font for the legend cell. The default value is "Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt".

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Font property can be used to set font properties of the legend cell.
If you attempt to change the properties of this <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object at run time, a compilation error will occur. To set font properties at run time, you must create a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Drawing.Color ForeColor { get; set; }

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the text color of the legend cell.
Docs.value: A value used to draw the legend cell text. The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.CellType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Image { get; set; }

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageValueEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the image in a legend cell.
Docs.value: A value that represents the name of the image to be used in the legend cell.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The image name should be a URL.
This property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.CellType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Drawing.Size ImageSize { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the size of the image in a legend cell.
Docs.value: A value that represents the size of the image. The default value is (0,0), which means the original size of the image will be used.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ImageSize property is used to explicitly set the width and height of the legend cell image.
This property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.CellType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Drawing.Color ImageTransparentColor { get; set; }

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a color which will be replaced with a transparent color when the image is drawn.
Docs.value: A value that is used as a transparent color in a legend cell image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ImageTransparentColor property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.CellType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.

Docs.summary: Gets the legend in which this cell belongs to.
Docs.value: A object in which this cell belongs to.

Docs.summary: Gets the legend item in which this cell belongs to.
Docs.value: A object in which this cell belongs to.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string MapAreaAttributes { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the map area attributes of the legend cell.
Docs.value: A value that represents the attributes of the legend cell's corresponding map area. The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If you set the MapAreaAttributes property, a client-side image map will automatically be created. A map area will also be created, with its attribute string appended to the \<map> tag that corresponds to the relevant legend cell.
The MapAreaAttributes property can be used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.Url%2A> property to specify map area attributes, for example, target= _blank, as well as client-side event handlers, for example, OnClick="MyEvent()".
Setting this property will have no effect if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A> property is set to `false`. The default value is `true`.
If the MapAreaAttributes property is set for both a series and a data point of that series, the data point property has precedence.
Special keywords may be used when setting this property, and each keyword will be replaced with some type of data from the applicable chart element.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the margins of the legend cell.
Docs.value: A object that represents the top, bottom, left, and right values of the legend cell margins. The default values for top, bottom, left and right are "0,0,15,15".

remarks.format: ## Remarks Margins are measured as a percentage of the font size for the legend cell.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Name { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the legend cell.
Docs.value: A value that represents the text name of the legend cell.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The name of the legend cell must be unique; otherwise an exception will be thrown.
The Name property can be used as the indexer when retrieving a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection>.
If you set this property to a zero-length string, an exception will be thrown.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a postback value that can be processed on a event.
Docs.value: A value that represents the postback value passed to a event.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Drawing.Size SeriesSymbolSize { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the size of the series symbol that is displayed in the legend cell.
Docs.value: A object that represents the size of the series symbol as a percentage of the legend font size. The default values for the width and height of the symbol are 200 and 70, respectively.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The size of the series symbol is measured as a percentage of the legend font size.
The SeriesSymbolSize property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.CellType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Text { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the legend cell text.
Docs.value: A value that represents the text for the legend cell. The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Text property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.CellType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ToolTip { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the tooltip text for the legend cell.
Docs.value: A value that represents the tooltip for the legend cell. The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Setting this property will have no effect if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A> property is set to `false`. The default value is `true`.
**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.RenderType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object must be set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RenderType>. It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used.
If the `ToolTip` property is set for both a legend item and a legend cell, the legend cell property has precedence.
This ToolTip property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data.
To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.MapAreas%2A> property of the root <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>object.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Url { get; set; }

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.UrlValueEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL target of the legend cell.
Docs.value: A value that represents the destination URL or anchor point of the chart element. To use an absolute URL, start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.". If the string does not start with either of these prefixes it will be treated as a relative URL.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If you set this property, a client-side image map will be automatically created. A map area will also be created with its Href attribute set to the specified anchor or URL.
Setting this property will have no effect if the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.IsMapEnabled%2A> property is set to `false`. The default value is `true`.
Attributes of the map area(s), for example, target=_blank, can be specified by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.MapAreaAttributes%2A> property.
The Url property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. For more information, see [Keywords](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.MapAreas%2A> property of the root <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object. For more information, see [Chart Image Rendering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
